events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago and the package has still not arrived. The estimated delivery date has passed and I have no updates from the courier.
The customer's issue has been identified as a delivery delay based on the description of late shipping and missing package.
The case was assigned to a customer service agent specialized in shipping issues for further assistance.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I understand your package is delayed and I’m here to help resolve the issue as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide your order number and the tracking information you have received so I can look into the shipment status for you?
Sure, my order number is 987654321 and the tracking ID is ZX123456789US, but the tracking website hasn’t updated the last status for several days.
I’ve contacted the courier with your tracking details and requested an urgent status update. Once confirmed, I will inform you immediately.
Thanks for the quick response and for reaching out to the courier. I appreciate you keeping me informed.
The courier has updated the shipment status and the package is now out for delivery. You should receive it today.
Just checking in to ensure you received your package and everything is in order. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
We are closing this case now as the delivery was successfully completed. Thank you for your patience and please contact us again if needed.
